title: EFL Competency Enhancement Program through Technology-Integrated Interactive Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Proficiency in basic English grammar and conversational communication skills
context.additional_context: Limited-technology environment utilizing smartphones, with intensive weekday evening or weekend classes for working professionals

learning_goals: Learners achieve over 80% accuracy in word/sentence repetition practice using the ClassPoint platform.
Learners demonstrate a participation rate of over 75% in smartphone-based quiz competitions with peers
Learners report a 20% improvement in learning self-efficacy through self-assessment surveys at the end of the lesson

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
